name: Space Shooter Game (kalakker)
description:
I have done the follofing  significant modifications ( at least 3 was necessary):

  • Reskined the existing graphics in some significant way, such as change the player or an enemy to a completely different character.
  • Replaced sound effects in the game to update the sound design of the game. (I replaced all the sound effects)
  • Added custom music to my game ( uniqly created musics)
  • Created 3 complete interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.
  • Added multiple additional levels and tied them in to create a logical progression in my game. ( lvl : level 1, labirinth and boss fight)
  • Modified the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.

Created by: Máté Potyesz
